data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 16,782 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ibaraki, Japan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 16,782 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Ibaraki, Japan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 2,964,100 people living in Ibaraki, Japan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Ibaraki who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Punjabi people might believe through him.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Ibaraki a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Ibaraki to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Ibaraki access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Ibaraki
location.people_groups_list: Persian, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Turk, Thai, Malay
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Persian (50,000), South Asian, Bengali-speaking (69,000), Turk (4,900), Thai (9,900), Malay (9,900)
